code: @Override public void validate(Message message, DataType type) throws ValidationException {     Object body = message.getBody().     LOG.info("Validating message body: {}", body).     if (!(body instanceof OrderResponse)) {         throw new ValidationException(message.getExchange(), "Expected OrderResponse, but was " + body.getClass()).     }     OrderResponse r = (OrderResponse) body.     if (!r.isAccepted()) {         throw new ValidationException(message.getExchange(), "Order was not accepted:" + r).     } }
